      • dateRangeCheck

        public static java.lang.String dateRangeCheck​(java.lang.String startDate,
                                              java.lang.String endDate)
        It is used to check the date validation
        To check if date is bigger than start date. date is valid and belongs to future
        Parameters:
        startDate - start date in dd-MM-yyyy format
        endDate - end date in dd-MM-yyyy format
        Returns:
        will return the validation message based on start and end date
